items.title: Two Y Combinator Partners Are Leaving To Start A New Series A Fund
items.description: Dalton Caldwell and Paul Buchheit, both long-tentured at the firm, are branching out from the storied tech incubator.

items.title: The Seven Deadly Tells Of AI Writing
items.description: The TED-talk style seeks to create engagement, drama, and snappy punch lines that border on insight but are decidedly not insightful.

items.title: Latest Social Media Conspiracy Theory Suggests Trump Wears A Leg Brace
items.description: The unsubstantiated claims took hold after the president, who will turn 79 on Saturday, stumbled while boarding Air Force One last weekend.
